title: Dagger +1
content:
found in a campfire next to a house. (X: 21; Y: 475) Dropped by: True Soul Nere, at Grymforge

Roah Moonglow, at Shattered Sanctum. Dammon, at Druid Grove. Brem at the Zhentarim Hideout.

Dagger +1 Notes & Tips

Not all items will be sold at the same time. Leveling up or completing a Long Rest will reset the shop and potentially show different Items. Rarity: Uncommon Value: 40 Gp. Weight: 0.45 Kg ID: WPN_Dagger_1

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmid
